Topic.Title: Quest Central! - A Discord for All Quest Users!

Posts.EditableText:
If you're already interested in joining, here's the link: https://discord.gg/vKqV9Pq

Need more convincing? Here's some of our features:

- Quest and Squiffy specific channels!

- Game advertising!

- A helpful community!

Don't think that's enough? Come on in, and suggest changes!

We're here to be the best place that you can talk to anyone with a Discord account and a love for Quest and Squiffy. Getting to know one another and having fun can make the program and games even more personal and awesome for everyone!


Can't wait to meet you here!

https://discord.gg/vKqV9Pq

_(By the way, if advertising a Discord server is not allowed, please let me know and I will edit the post to remove advertising! I could not find any concrete rules on what was allowed here.)_
